description: Discharge of Condition 5 (Sustainable Drainage Strategy) of planning application 19/01238/FUL (Demolition of existing dwellinghouse and erection of two storey dwellinghouse with single storey guest annexe in garden) dated 09/04/2020
decision_conditions: In the absence of sufficient information with regards to the maintenance and management of the proposed SUDS, the proposal fails to prevent the increased risk of flooding by ensuring the provision of a satisfactory means of surface water disposal is incorporated into the design and the build of the proposed development, thereby conflicting with Policies 5.2 and 5.3 of the London Plan (2016) and Policy DM1 of the Core Strategy Adopted (2012).

Elevations - Please provide Existing and Proposed Elevations at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing all elevations not just part and indicating all key dimensions for the proposed work. A scale bar is encouraged.
